text: Yves Saint Laurent SAS (, , , ), also known as Saint Laurent and YSL, is a French luxury fashion house founded in 1961 by Yves Saint Laurent and his partner, Pierre Bergé. The company focuses on ready-to-wear, leather accessories, and footwear. Its cosmetics line, YSL Beauty, is owned by L'Oréal. ==References== Category:1961 establishments in France Category:French fashion houses Category:Companies based in Paris
title: Yves Saint Laurent (fashion house)
